overview: Co-directors Proxy Paige and Charlie Dean create free-spirited, unformulaic sex scenes in the eye-catching Pastel. They style frisky, lustful cuties in pale-hued finery and outfit them with sex toys in complementary colors. Action includes a kinky king's threesome and a trio of playful lesbian trysts. Hot beauties Alexis Crystal, Anna de Ville and Eden Ivy tease, strip and spread their hungry holes for the camera.
title: Pastel
